statement: The sun rises in the east and sets in the west
Apples are a type of fruit
The human body is made up of approximately 60% water
Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into energy
The theory of relativity was proposed by Albert Einstein.
Quantum mechanics is a branch of physics that studies the behavior of subatomic particles
The Earth revolves around the Sun
The concept of time dilation arises from the theory of relativity, suggesting that time can appear to move slower for objects moving at high speeds relative to others
The human brain weighs about 3 pounds (1.4 kilograms)
Soccer is also known as football in many countries
